Module com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager
Package com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.controllers.watchlist

Class WatchlistRow

java.lang.Object
com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.controllers.watchlist.WatchlistRow
public class WatchlistRow extends Object
A row in the watchlist table, backed by an IStock instance.
